casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the ESTATE OF Richard Dixon PEACOCK Date of Death: 12/19/2013 No. 276P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016 Regan H. Rozier, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, for Peacock, Bernadine. G. Grady Richardson, Jr., Attorney at Law, for K.A.P. (Minor)

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 26th of July 2016 by Respondent in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."
